p.seg: “Step forward, Perfected!
You have been coming to study the doctrine for such a long time.
You have really learnt it all by now, don’t you think?”
“If, for example, you, Teacher from Heaven had not again spoken to me,
I might have thought it was already enough.
But as soon as I am faced with your words,
I understand that in a way it is not enough.
Now I would like to reach the ultimate point
but I don’t know what further question to ask.
If the Teacher from Heaven would only reveal my shortcomings once again!”
“All right,
Come here.
In this world, what is it one calls “rich” or “satisfactory”
and what is it one calls “poor”?”
“Well,
those who have much are rich
and those who have few things are poor.”
“Well,
what you have said is true
but it is at the same time in fact false.”
“What do you mean?”
“Take someone, for example, who cheats, deceives, flatters, steals and robs much. (has much wickednes, hypocrisy, villainy CH)
How could he be called “rich”?
Or take, for example, a situation where the ordinary people have much (if ordinary people have little CH)
while the rulers and kings have little, (and rulers have little)
How can one call the rulers and kings poor?"
“As a foolish and stupid person, when the Teacher from Heaven set out to instruct me
I did not dare not to speak up.
I am not good enough. I am at fault. “
“If you say you are not good enough, (No if necessary! CH)
how shall the common people know the meaning of poor and rich?”
“If you would only think of your disciple’s ignorance
like that of a small child
who must be instructed by its father and mother before it gains understanding.”
“Well put,
what you say.
You may be excessively modest
But still you don’t go amiss.”
“Yes.”
“Collect your thoughts.
I will explain everything to you.
We speak of “richness”
when there is sufficiency in all respects.
By making everything grow, heaven provides richness and sufficiency. [Heaven regards it as being “completely rich” to bring forth all manner of creatures.
Thus when supreme majestic qi arises
and twelve thousand kinds of creatures are brought to life
we say that there is richness and sufficiency.
Under the influence of medium majestic qi creatures are slightly deficient
in that it cannot provide for all twelve thousand kinds of them.
This causes small poverty.
When under the influence of lower majestic qi, plants and beings are again fewer than under the influence of medium majestic qi,
and this causes great poverty. (constitutes great penury. CH)
When there are no auspicious portents [signifying the approach of majestic qi] at all,
the good things (:crops) won’t grow,
which is extreme low poverty.
If you wish to know what this amounts to ,
take a look at a peasant family.
Should they not possess any rare and valuable objects,
they are considered a poor family.
Should they not be supplied with what they need, they must be seen as an extremely poor family.
The problem lies in the poverty of heaven and earth. (This is penury from Heaven and Earth CH)
Once all twelve thousand kinds of creatures come forth
and are nurtured by earth without detriment, earth becomes rich. (and they suffer no harm then this is wealth from Earth CH)
If it can’t (read 而 as loan for 能 CH) nurture them well,
it becomes slightly poor as long as injuries remain small, (and Earth causes slight injury, then that counts as "lesser penury from EarthCH)
and quite poor, should they be large. (and when the creatures suffer great injury that counts as "great penury from Earth".CH)
If good things were to shy away from being seen
and fail to grow, injured by earth’s body,
this would lead to extreme poverty.
Without jade and other valuables
and with half the yields damaged,
great distress and poverty would come about.
Such complete damage would eradicate a poor family. (a family completely empty of all resources CH)
Now think of heaven as father
and earth as mother.
Should father and mother be in such extreme poverty
all their children would suffer from poverty.
The king’s government is a replica of this.
Thus the wise kings of antiquity
whose reign reached out to all twelve thousand kinds of creatures,
became lords of great wealth.
Good things that reach two-thirds of their potential
provide a lord with medium wealth.
When they amount to only one-third,
he has but little wealth.
With neither valuables nor good things,
he becomes a lord of great poverty.
Once half of his harvests are damaged,
his house is in decline.
If all are damaged, he becomes a man of great poverty.
The wise and worthy of antiquity in their dark chamber
reflected on the question of how through [adhering to] dao and virtue
poverty and wealth were to be achieved.
Why should anyone ask about this?
Through meditation, men will find out for themselves. “
“Excellent!
If the Teacher from Heaven would only show kindness to emperors and kings!
They have suffered bitterly and for a long time,
and have been frustrated in their ambition.
Whereby does one achieve such poverty and wealth?”
“Excellent!
Your question
touches upon the crucial point of certain subtle sayings.
Well, how they are put into practice brings about gain and loss.
Once someone follows the true doctrine with all his might,
heaven’s life-giving spirits will help his mission.
So spirits sent by heaven and good things will be plenty.
If a man enacts virtue,
earth’s nourishing spirits will come forth
to assist his conduct of affairs.
Thus, he will gain half of his potential wealth.
Once someone enacts humaneness,
the humane spirits of the harmony that prevails in the realm between heaven and earth will step forward to help him conduct his affairs
and achieve a small measure of wealth.
Someone who attempts cultural refinement
is on the way to intrigues and deceit,
so that deceitful spirits will come forth to help him.
Thus his conduct will be in some disorder.
But if he were to undertake military action,
bandit spirits would be bound to appear in his support.
Government would thus be directed against the will of heaven.
It would injure and harm even good men.
Dao
sets the rule for heaven’s conduct.
Since heaven is the highest of all spirits
true spirits step forward to assist its mission.
Since earth nurtures,
virtuous spirits step forward to assist its mission.
Since he is humane,
humane spirits come forth to help a man’s mission.
Cultured men are preoccupied with deceiving each other by means of culture,
they have lost their root.
thus deceitful spirits appear to assist them.
Once superiors and inferiors deal with each other by means of culture
their affairs are in disorder.
Soldiers subdue others through punishment, murder and injury.
Bandits do the same.
Any man who in subduing others is guided by anger, joy, violence, and severity
is a bandit.
So, large numbers of bandits step forth
to threaten his reign.
Since they often damage people’s belongings
Such a way of government entails a loss of property.
Thus antiquity’s supreme lords, who subdued others through dao,
largely accorded with the will of heaven.
They governed as if they were spirits.
Without causing distress
they subdued others through true dao.
Lords of middle rank exert control through virtue,
and lords of lower rank through humaneness.
Lords of chaos subdue others through cultural refinement,
and those of disaster and defeat rule by punishing, murdering and injuring others.
Thus the supreme lords of antiquity ruled over others through dao, virtue, and humaneness
instead of inflicting injuries by means of culture or through punishing and murdering others.
Since this is the case,
the use of such means is despicable.
However, a supreme lord resembles heaven and earth.
Since heaven is prone to giving life rather than inflicting injuries,
we call it lord and father.
Since earth likes to nurture the ten thousand plants and beings,
we call it honest official and mother.
Since man thinks in a humane manner
and shows the same concern and care as heaven and earth do,
we call him humane.
Through their goodness these three
manage to govern the ten thousand plants and beings
and to lead them.
But by deceiving and punishing
one cannot govern,
[for then] disasters grow in number
and make it impossible for emperors and kings to achieve great peace.
So this must stop.
Now if you, Perfected, were to give my book to a lord in possession of dao and virtue
and he implemented what it says energetically,
he would reach a position that would correspond to that of heaven.
Thus he would achieve great peace.
That we would call his house rich
is not in doubt.
In this case nothing would cause emperors and kings to suffer distress.
In the opposite case we would speak of a poor house.”
“Nowadays people sometimes call each other ‘rich families’.
Why is this so?”
“This is what they do, but the common people talk nonsense.
When we use the word “rich”
we mean that everything is provided for.
If only a single item is lacking,
[supplies] are incomplete.
For this reason the wise and worthy of old did not demand perfection from individuals,
They did not see them fit for it,
so they did not make the demand.
Today in all eighty-one territories
goods are in short and incomplete supply.
It is impossible to achieve any long term sufficiency
So goods are obtained from other territories.
Now to what degree can one individual family be rich?
Would you like to go along with the nonsense that common people put forth?”
“No, I would not dare to. “
“You have learnt to watch your words,
so don’t utter nonsense.
By uttering nonsense
you might bring disorder to the standard patterns of heaven and earth
and they won’t serve as a model for men.
Be careful. “
“Yes, I will.
Now the Teacher from Heaven has shown himself to be merciful and loving.
He has kind regard for emperors and kings who on their thrones
suffer distress
and fail to be in favour with heaven.
Since it has all been explained to them
they should be able to find the path that leads to the great peace of supreme majesty.“
“Foolish as I am, I have received a large amount of writings.
I feel dizzy and confused as if I was a youngster
and don’t know what to ask next.
Since you are heaven’s enlightened teacher,
do convey all its warnings. “
“Excellent!
Well, according to the model set by heaven,
Yang’s cipher is one
and that of Yin two.
So Yang is single.
and Yin is a pair.
Therefore, lords are few and subordinates are many.
Since Yang is honoured
and Yin is humble,
two Yin must jointly serve one Yang.
Since heaven’s cipher is one and that of earth is two,
two women must jointly serve one man.
Why should it be necessary that two persons care for one?
The place next to someone in an honoured position must never be left empty.
When one is employed
the other must remain standing or sitting next to the person in the centre
to look after his needs.
So the one
Resembles heaven
while the two
are similar to earth.
Since men
are children of heaven and earth,
they must imitate both.
The world has nowadays lost dao,
so girls are often despised
and even maltreated and murdered,
which has caused there to be fewer girls than boys.
So Yin’s qi is cut off,
which does not agree with the model of heaven and earth.
Heaven’s way establishes the model
that a solitary Yang without a partner
will bring drought
and cause heaven not to rain when it should.
Women correspond to earth.
Should one single woman be despised,
it is as if all in the world despise their true mother.
Should they maltreat, hurt, or murder earth’s qi
it will be cut off and cease to give life.
In great anger the earth would then turn hostile,
so that a plethora of disasters
would make it impossible for the king’s government to achieve peace.“
“Why?”
“The male
is heaven’s vital spirit;
the female
is earth’s.
Things influence each other within their own kind.
That his government is not at peace
is not only the king’s fault.
Instead, men have in general lost dao and become negligent.
They are all wrong.
Since there is not just one mistake
but ten thousand,
it is difficult to conduct government affairs peacefully and they tend to go wrong.
It is the nature of heaven and earth
that among all twelve thousand kinds of creatures
human life is the most important.
Thus maltreating and murdering women
brings profound disorder to a king’s government.
This is a great offence.“
“Now the Teacher from Heaven has opened to kings the ascent to great peace.
The true scripture on great peace has appeared.
Thus they need only at their leisure to go on long spiritual journeys.
Now that to violate women entails so much calamity for them.
How can this be?”
“Good,
your question!
You understand what heaven wants.
Truly the whole world despises and hates women,
because they condemn their conduct.“
“What do you mean?
I wish to hear it.
I will try to take notes on bamboo and silk
so that for ten thousand times ten thousand generations no one will dare to depart from it.”
“Fine,
Now that you can put it down in writing,
the world will in future never again murder women.”
”Yes,
I want to write it down
in order to free emperors and kings from calamities.
I take pleasure
in saving the lives of women stricken with grief.“
“Good.
Now you have gained points in the accounts kept by heaven.”
“What do you mean?”
“Indeed,
to give life to others means giving life to oneself,
and to kill others means to kill oneself.
Heaven’s concern for you may already have increased your account with heaven.
So the Controller of Fate will make alterations in your personal records.”
“This I would never dare to accept,
never.”
“One must not turn it down;
it lies within the model of heaven being the way it is.
Well, women are murdered all over the world [for the following reason]:
As long as a human being is young and small
a father and mother suffer distress.
They skimp on their own clothes and food in order to rear it.
It is not only human beings who behave like this;
all things that crawl and run behave like this.
Everyone, big or small, must when grown up
put all their energy into the search for
Thus the ten thousand beings all leave their father and mother to clothe and feed themselves.
If they are worthy they meet with happiness.
If they are not they are in distress.
Furthermore, when young,
a child gains daily more strength until it has ample,
while its father and mother are daily more wasted by old age.
Their strength diminishes until it no longer suffices.
But, a child, whether male or female
with its surplus of knowledge, worthiness and strength
must nourish its father and mother in return for their exertion and kindness on its behalf.
So its father and mother must no longer clothe and feed it
or we say “the weak is nourishing the strong”.
Should someone with insufficient muscle power nourish those who have more than they need,
we speak about ‘adverse policy’.
Young ones who are bound to bring distress to those who are older
without providing any gain for their father and mother
are therefore often killed by them.
Now their father and mother murder them because clothes and food are scarce.
Wouldn’t it be better to rear them
and let them find their own clothes and food?
Perfected,
this is really a grievous interruption of the earth’s dispensation.
People are so foolish. “
“Now that I have heard this,
I feel sad and alarmed.
I understand that there are many grievances.
What should be done?”
“Well,
someone who likes to study but does not get clothes and food
is stopped on his way since his studies are interrupted.
But if he gets clothes and food,
the worthy does not cease to learn.
We should let everyone be of some use.
If not they would instead cause distress and misery.”
“What do you mean?”
“Now a woman has no abode.
By attending to her husband
as a man does by attending to his office
she must get clothes and food.
When a woman attends to her husband`s house
they must support each other and lead their life in unison.
Together they continue the dispensation of heaven and earth,
until in death their bones and flesh are returned to the same place.
From supporting each other
they get clothes and food.
If they are worthy, they will be happy.
If not, they will suffer.
Take soil as an example:
To the rich produce of fertile soil
heaven will add its share;
for the poor produce of fertile soil
it will do exactly the same;
It certainly does not deprive soil of giving growth.
Heaven and earth would never deprive a women of her achievement.
How much more so should this be men’s axiom!
If it were, men would never again kill their women!”
“Excellent!
As soon as this one great and severe damage has been averted,
great peace will come about for emperors and kings.”
“How do you know this, Perfected?”
“Well,
the affection father and mother feel for their child (the relation CH)
is the most solid in the world.
If the child did not make them miserable and distressed
there would be no reason to kill it.
They must not kill it
or else their qi becomes that of bandits
and in their great contrariness they are thoroughly devoid of dao. (it is utterly immoral CH)
For this reason it throws the reign of emperors and kings into deep disorder. (the good government CH)
Now if women
were to live without being maltreated, murdered and violated
there would be great joy. “
“Yes,
what you say is true.
We may assume that you have understood.
How if one family (in this world CH) kills one female:
how many hundreds of thousands of families are there all over the world?
Sometimes one family kills dozens of females
or a foetus before birth
is injured.
Grief-stricken qi rises up to move heaven.
How can these acts not be disorderly? (How this (moving of Heaven) lack principle, be unreasonable? CH)
So I truly want you to know more about it. (???)
Should every human being through her own effort provide her own clothes and food,
no wife would be of two hearts.
She would concentrate on her own activities
and never again harbour any doubts.
Those who lack achievement
are forever deprived of balance of mind.
So much
for the methods that nature, being as it is suggests.
Pay attention, Perfected,
that you don’t lay this book aside,
but give it to a lord who is humane and worthy,
so that he can free [men] from all the grief they are stricken with and from the calamities that injure them.
Pay attention to what my book says
so that you can explain it to everyone.
It must never again be permissible to do away with females.
Furthermore, this rule agrees with the model of heaven and earth
according to which one man should have two wives
because heaven has arranged (Thus when Heaven organised the model for things Ch)
Yang is single (odd CH)
and Yin is as pair. (even CH)
Since the height of middle antiquity
men have forgotten what heaven’s way intends
and have often maltreated and murdered females,
which in turn caused men to be numerous and women to be so few that there were not enough.
This is grossly opposed to heaven’s way.
Men have caused even more [evil] to be inherited and passed on
by making [the killing of females] common practice.
Later generations have multiplied the world’s trespasses,
so that it has become completely devoid of dao.
Man is heir to heaven’s dispensation
and woman to that of earth.
If we were to cut off earth’s dispensation
we would no longer be able to reproduce ourselves,
and then many of us would die without progeny.
What an awful crime!
Thus all must reproduce themselves and continue their kind.
But if we were to interrupt earth’s dispensation
and exterminate humankind,
heaven would forever put an end to the species populating this world.
Moreover, when human beings come to life, heaven’s qi shines forth in all of them. (they encompass the qi of Heaven and ...CH)
Their head is round
like heaven,
their feet are square
like earth,
the four limbs
resemble the four seasons,
the five internal organs
the five phases,
while ears and eyes, mouth and nose
are like the seven regents or the three luminaries.
I cannot explain to you all of this, (give an account of CH)
but wise men know about it. (Only CH)
The life of human beings is all Yin and Yang.
Once the number of days and months is completed, they open the womb and step outside.
In sight of heaven and earth they grow up.
Together they continue the dispensation of their ancestors.
They assist heaven in giving life to plants and beings
and assist earth in nourishing what has taken shape.
Since the spirits of heaven and earth put their trust in a certain family,
their dispensation comes to life in a certain human being.
That men damage it,
heaven sees as a grave misdeed.
But men won’t keep each other in check.
Therefore heaven has sent me to make this book
known to the generations to come.
Although these matters are quite manifest
they are still continued, consciously.
We must say that this is to consciously act against the model set by heaven.
It is a crime of many layers
and will no doubt put an end to humankind.
Beware, Perfected,
be on your guard.”
“Yes, I will.”
“Now that you have understood these issues,
should you neglect these writings
you and not others will be put on trial. “
“I would not dare to do so.”
“You may go now,
and may each of you follow your own device.”
“Yes, we will. “

p.seg: “It means that a child at birth receives life from father and mother.
Once it is born
and when small
it never imagines that father and mother will depart.
This is the first constraint.
When children have grown up they can’t help it:
daughters desire a husband
and sons a wife.
They are unable to control their emotions,
and the love they feel does not allow of any separation.
This is the second constraint.
Their love
brings forth children.
While man and wife grow older
they become less attractive,
their children are young and lovely.
But they must be brought up.
This is the third constraint.
When children have grown up
and no longer need to be nourished,
parents will have become old and unable to do things.
This is the fourth constraint.
Having been under these four constraints
and able to find an enlightened teacher
and fix their thoughts on safeguarding dao it might still work.
With great talent and under heaven’s command they might be able to transcend this world
or, second best, gain longevity.
Or they might enjoy living in their body as long as it lasts and
when hun and po spirit are below ground,
have further cause for joy.”
“What do you mean?”
“Down below when they receive someone who has just died
they always ask what he has done and what he has achieved while alive.
Thus during one’s lifetime it is decided how one is entered in the registers.
Men are accountable for their deeds
and must for this reason act with great care.
Whether someone is safe or in danger depends entirely on himself.
Keep it in mind, Perfected.
You understand that this is to warn you?”
“Yes, I do.
What the Teacher from Heaven tells me is new to me.”
„Well,
I tell you these things
because I see that you continue to have good intentions.
I am afraid you might become idle and weary,
so I see the need for clarification, documentation and instruction.”
“Yes.”
“As for your present studies,
what do you expect from them?”
“I expect to fulfil my years.”
“What an excellent aim!
We may say that you have grasped what dao means.
Well,
it is the way of the common people
that they all expect to die of old age,
while what they really die from is the good and bad [of their deeds].”
“What do you mean?
I would like to know.”
“Well,
stick to the study of the good,
let your spirit roam about and be merry, and when you die,
you will become a demon who merrily roams about.
It is incontestable that never again will you suffer any distress.
Those who bring distress and suffering upon themselves turn into demons who suffer distress after death.
A wicked person becomes after death a wicked demon.
All these matters are obvious enough
for everyone to see,
and yet men don’t want to do good
and make their hun spirit happy.
This is a most severe fault.“
“What do you mean?”
“At birth men receive the standard qi of heaven and earth.
By the four seasons and five phases
they are joined to become human beings.
This was the situation with the ancestors.
[For a while] they each dwelt as a particular body among the four seasons and five phases of heaven and earth.
For their part they always loved to do good and never had any worries.
But life went on.
Later generations were different. All along they have plagued the bodies of heaven and earth, the four seasons, and the five phases.
So they were left to die of personal resentment.
There was even trouble for the hun and the po spirit.
So we know that foolish scholars make shallow plans
and do not suffice to exist for long.
Therefore they make a man want to die quickly
and show no regret when he dies.
The vital spirits [who reside in a man’s body] are grieved and sad [about this].
They have given these lowly scholars no cause to thus distress and anger them.
So the great worthies and wise men of old who gave profound council and were farsighted knew what it was like.
Therefore they never ceased studying.
A sovereign who enjoys thinking of great peace
gains heaven’s approval.
His merit multiplies.
His hun spirit roams happily forever
and partakes in heaven’s good qi.
Someone not able to bring peace to his reign
rules not in agreement with heaven’s will,
does not obtain heaven’s favour
and gains no merit with heaven on high.
Even when he comes to his end
his hun spirit is still held responsible in the world below
and is joined with wicked qi.
For this reason the lords of supreme wisdom in early antiquity who know of this
worked very hard.
Because a foolish man’s council is shallow
he is held to account by heaven as long as he lives
and by earth after his death.”
“How frightening.
Although your disciple is foolish and blind
I do not wish to hear of this.”
“Good!
You have come here to learn.
If you do not wish to hear such things
you just have to work hard to do good.”
“Yes, I will.
[For as long] as the Teacher from Heaven lives on earth
he makes me understand heaven’s command.
What I have been taught is deep and substantive.
So what can I do to prevent such things?”
“Good!
You must quickly spread my teachings
so that all men under heaven will follow them.
They will for their own person stabilize vital essence
and in their thoughts be together with great dao.
Then they will know for themselves where trespasses and errors come from,
and the load [of trespasses] that has been received and is transmitted is abolished.
Heaven and earth will rejoice,
and the years of life will be multiplied by a return back to [the situation] of early antiquity.”
“Excellent!”
“ “All right,
our talk has reached a certain conclusion.
Study hard,
and come again another day.”
”Yes, I will.”
“Think carefully about the writings you have received, from beginning to end.
Not to concentrate on one’s studies
is, it must be said, confused.
Research into things will not reach [the realms] without form and shape
thinking will not touch upon vital spirits
and there will be nothing to go by.”
“Excellent!”
“Now heaven
is ‘one’.
It turns to earth, which is ‘two’.
What does this mean?
Now earth,
which is ‘two’,
will turn to man who is ‘three’.
Why?
I would like to know what this means that they turn one to the other.”
“Well,
now earth is employed by heaven
and man is employed by earth.
Therefore when heaven rejoices in happiness
it will for that year make the ten thousand things that are on earth grow well.
Should it not rejoice in happiness
even if earth would like to rear [them]
[heaven] would let these things decay.
If earth is good
then the people who live on it will love the good.
This clearly proves how they employ each other.
Therefore by means of too many embellishments a reign becomes disorderly
and does not obtain heaven’s approval.
Instead, one should return to the root of things.
Now when men speak too much they do not see this.
They should instead return to a basic guideline
in order to sustain their words and deeds.
Therefore what is completed in a single [layer of] words
is the original text.
When we stop after a second turn of words
we create chapter and verse commentaries.
When we stop at the third [layer of] words
we then create an analysis of difficult passages.
Because men tend to move away from the truth
there is the analysis of difficult passages.
When we stop at the fourth [layer of] words
we then create adaptations [of the original text].
When we stop at the fifth [layer of] words
we then create a fake [text].
When we stop at the sixth [layer of] words
we then create deceit.
When we stop at the seventh [layer of] words
we then create a distortion [of the original text].
When we stop at the eighth [layer of] words
we then create teachings that are different, confused and distant,
with the distance getting bigger and bigger.
When we stop at the ninth [layer of] words
we then create great disorder.
When we stop at the tenth [layer of] words
we then create complete corruption.
Therefore a scripture that has reached the tenth [stage] is to be revised
or its further transmission will end in extinction.
Whatever has been destroyed must return to the root.
Therefore for a new beginning we return to safeguarding the one.
Therefore the numbers of heaven begin in one
and end in ten.
This is the nature of heaven’s way as it is.
Therefore when the wise men of old had a query
they undertook a first divination
whether the situation was auspicious or ominous.
Since they guarded their root,
spirits sent by heaven would descend and make the announcement.
When one divines a second time,
spirits sent by earth step forth to make the announcement.
When one divines a third time,
spirits sent by men step forth and make the announcement.
If one goes beyond this
one deceives the others and cannot prognosticate.
So divining often we do not hit the truth.
If someone’s sayings and writings are numerous they are not held precious.”
“Excellent!
Now since the Teacher from Heaven always takes pity on my shortcomings,
I would like to beg permission to say one more thing.”
“Go ahead.”
“Why do the numbers [of heaven] stop at ten?”
“Good.
You are very keen on knowing if you ask about the pattern of these things.
Well,
the numbers of heaven begin with one
and end in ten.
“Why is this so?”
“Heaven begins as one.
When it moves downwards to be with earth there are two.
Yin and Yang jointly create life.
The ten thousand things start sprouting in the north
since primordial qi arises from zi “son”.
When [primordial qi] turns towards the northeast
[things] spread roots in jue “horn”.
When [primordial qi] turns towards the east
it makes sprouts shine forth.
When it turns towards the southeast
it makes all the branches and leaves grow.
When it turns south they become thick.
When it turns towards the southwest they become almost complete.
When it turns west the produce is ripe.
When it turns towards the northwest things die.
Since what is dead must again return to a beginning
hai “pig” is two human beings who embrace the one thus commencing the three majesties.
Therefore hai
is kernel.
The kernel is were congealing sets in.
Therefore water starts freezing in the tenth month.
Ren “ninth”
is being pregnant.
What has become pregnant must grow bigger each day
so zi “son”
is growing.
At [the time of these] three [hai, ren, zi] [things] have completely matured through the harmonious qi of Yin and Yang
and turn back to the very beginning.
Therefore they return to the root.
We speak of jia zi.
Now when heaven’s way gives life to things
they are bound to be everywhere.
They all observe the qi of heaven and earth, the four seasons and the five phases.
Thereby they become complete.
With one qi not being sufficient
they will soon not suffice.
Therefore taking their root in heaven and earth they encircle [what lies in] the eight directions
numbers as a whole amount to ten.
Do you, Perfected, understand any better?”
“Yes, I do.
Excellent!
How very kind of you.”
“Do not say thank you.”
“Why not?”
“The task of teaching a disciple is heavy
just as father and mother giving life to a child.
You cannot free yourself [from your obligation] by saying thank you.“
”What do you mean?”
“When father and mother have not yet brought forth children
they may perhaps foolishly spread semen on uncultivated land
and should it suit the soil it may bring forth trees and other plants.
They are indeed not aware of what it is to be human.
Whether semen has reached the ground
how indeed should they be able to tell?
So they bring forth trees and other plants.
But being able to bring Yin and Yang together
giving birth,
and bringing forth a human being -
how is this related to bringing forth trees and other plants?
A man who has come to life
may be careless and not serve a good teacher
and instead serve a hideous and utterly foolish teacher
who instructs others in how to do wrong.
Learning how to become engaged in evil activities
will sometimes lead a man to death and ruin.
He will in person [be accused of] even more crimes and trespasses,
and his family will be extinguished.
Or he may stay alive without knowledge and learning
and will thus become a fool.
Now a man without knowledge
will not only die in distress and misery
But will also be accused of his faults in the world down below.
What hun and po spirit will experience will not allow him to roam about happily
and he himself will when dead not manage to become a good demon.
Now a man who has learned from a good teacher
will change from being utterly foolish and mean to being a good person.
Should he not stop at being good
he may become worthy.
Should he not stop at being worthy
he may then become wise.
Should he not stop at being wise,
he may acquire profound knowledge of true dao.
Should he not stop at safeguarding dao,
he may become transcendent and not die.
Should he not stop at being transcendent
he may become perfected.
Should he not stop at being perfected
he may become spirit.
Should he not stop at being spirit
he may become virtuous as is heaven.
Should he not stop at resembling heaven
he may become virtuous as is primordial qi.
Primordial qi embraces heaven and earth in the eight directions.
Nothing would not live by receiving its qi.
Virtue continues to cover heaven and earth in the eight directions,
and vital spirits come from heaven and earth to drink and eat.
No one in all under heaven would not make them offerings.
And yet he would always remain fearful that he might slacken
and not be able to make [spirits] come.
This is the merit achieved when a good teacher produces a good student.
Is it possible to say thank you for this?”
“How frightening.
Foolish as I am I have broken a sacred rule.
I have trespassed in what I have said.”
“How modest. No more.
You are a Perfected.
All right,
you have understood that a student must not say thank you for having gained knowledge.“
”Yes, I have.“

p.seg: “Excellent, really deep.
Your question,
how penetrating!
[Since] you direct your question at a point of such importance
do you intend to make false texts vanish by promoting the best teachings?
Yes, I do.
“I am about to tell you all.
You have piled up a store of good deeds in heaven.
How would I dare hiding anything?
Now, in your case, sympathy with your good deeds
has reached the heart of spirits and other illustrious beings.
Not to talk to you would not work.
It would as we must fear offend heaven’s intention.
Since heaven has sent you to ask questions
I will for your sake analyse the whole.
Keep up with it and take notes.
Take care to leave nothing out.
If the souvereign were able to implement my writings with energy
disaster and other harm would from one day to the next be removed.
All-under-heaven would be in complete joy.
Everyone would want to be a person practicing dao and its virtue.
The later born would follow the example of former generations.
Old and young would thrive, one succeeding the other.
They would moreover all know how to search for true texts and revise affairs.
Trivial and superficial pursuits would vanish.
In their heart men would be in complete accord with spirits and other numinous beings.
The ruler would have nothing to pain him.
What could be the reason for him not to roam about, day after day?
In this way all affairs in heaven and on earth
obtain their place.
In consequence the hundred spirits are happy and joyful.
Once a king fully comprehends heaven’s intention
the best dao comes to his support.
He is simply in better luck from day to day
without a single misadventure.
My words are sincere and reliable.
They never fail.
But it must be feared that should men understand my words and not act accordingly
falseness of all sorts would become entangled in knots.
Disasters and irregularities as well as trivial and superficial pursuits
are the great illness of heaven and earth and Yin and Yang.
When there is great illness and no remedy
how can anyone untie [the knots] and devise a cure?
You have come to ask about affairs and
speak words on behalf of heaven.
If you think in detail about what is said in my writings, from beginning to end,
it is to be hoped that you will get the meaning.
Take care not to confuse things.”
“Yes, we will.
It will certainly be in our power to return to a convenient abode
where we will think and reflect day and night.
We will report what has been transmitted to us
and will in turn add another commentary.
In ten thousand generations there will not be a time when this would vanish.”
Since the separation between heaven and earth,
in speaking and in writing,
what comes before and what comes afterwards depend on each other.
Affairs of identical qi elucidate each other by category.
We search for [things] by category and bring them together.
The teachings derived from this become day by day more obvious.
and will never experience a period of decline.
Therefore from antiquity until today
a number of sages have talked to each other about heaven,
and a number of worthy men have agreed with what [the sages] have said.
Together they have made wise plans.
The sovereign
is heaven’s honoured son.
When the son receives the father’s instruction
he must act accordingly
in order to remove what pains heaven and earth.
In consequence he gains their support.
Therefore I say that you must think of it and work for it.
My teachings do not mislead you!
To see things we must perceive them.
Since we do not perceive spirits and the other illustrious beings of heaven and earth
we must seek even harder for response between one hundred thousand things,
between ten thousand, one thousand, one hundred, ten and even single things.
All things must be in mutual response.
The evidence thus established can be put to use.
In case something is not in mutual response
we must urgently undertake another search
for its older and younger brothers who are of the same category
and will certainly be in mutual response.
This is invariably
so.
”If this must hold true for all affairs
then through which evidence do we know what is in response to what?”
“When there is mutual response
it will certainly on the inside reach the heart
on the outside be in response with celestial and terrestrial spirits.
and the distant and the close at hand will set each other in motion.
If in predicting affairs they turn out as predicted
then there is indeed response.
If there is no mutual response
what is said is all wrong.
Be careful not to speak thoughtlessly.
It may cut a man off from posterity.
This is so because
uttering thoughtless sayings is of no consequence [i.e. not proven true]
and cannot be maintained for long.
Therefore [such sayings] let a man be without posterity.
From day to day the way of governing declines.
Mischievous and oppositional men all have different things to say.
This is decidedly wrong.
It all equals [acts] confusing the patterns of heaven and the structures of earth.
and since it does not equal what a wise man feels
spirits cannot be employed.
Therefore words
must on the inside reach a man’s feelings and heart.
Only then is accord at the outside
and [the words] reach celestial and terrestrial spirits.
This
entails gain and loss
and is a warning derived from heaven’s patterns.
When we collect texts we let them follow each other according to category.
If a number of worthy men put them together
they select from the texts’s midst passages that are in response ten times out of ten.
By responding to what men feel and to celestial and terrestrial spirits they make a text,
jointly deliberate its meaning
and test it through the turn-out.
This procedure is not to be altered in ten thousand generations.
Turn-out
means that if we predict something there is response.
If we do something the result is in response.
This is what is meant.
After [having finished the text] they can on its basis complete heaven’s authoritative model.
This is exactly what is meant by the great art of securing the king’s [rein] by means of adjusting Yin and Yang.
This can turn ill luck and misfortune into good fortune
and make the people live longer.”
„For what reason?”
“If patterns of heaven and structures of earth are straight
Yin and Yang each obtain their place.
If Yin and Yang each obtain their place
spirits and other numinous beings are all very happy.
If spirits and other numinous beings are happy,
they assist the people.
Therefore the sovereign enjoys long-lasting security and the people are long living.
How could it be that we would not work hard for this?
Flying brilliance
is a small version of the three luminaries,
in all respects linked to earth down below
and yet hanging from the sky.
Its movements closely respond to the people and the ten thousand things that are on earth.
It proves the essential text right.
Such writings and texts predict things.
They are right when there is response in one hundred out of one hundred and ten out of ten cases.
They are wrong when there is no response.
When in this way measured
such false texts and false writings will all completely vanish.
We rely on past events in order to examine present events.
Following heaven we can be effective
Looking at heaven we can thrive.
Not confusing heaven’s patterns
we share heaven’s energy.
This can be called long lasting good luck.
But we must only obey heaven and must not oppose it.
By these means we make profit and profit others,
which lets a man thrive.
To oppose heaven lets a man decline.
To ignore heaven’s intention is to perish. 」

div.head: 3.28《移行試驗類相應占訣第六十八》

p.seg: Things go either in the wrong or in the right direction.
This we must well observe in detail.
If you want to know how to prove this
test five times five, this is twenty- five cases.
Take twenty-five old cases
and twenty-five persons that are recent.
Carefully take note of the year, day, and month and time of day each person stems from,
and to which of the five tones his [surname] belongs.
Then predict lucky and unlucky times.
What proves to be in response in one hundred cases out of one hundred and in ten out of ten is right.
That this evidence takes account of the structural divisions of heaven and earth and secures the king’s [rein]
is not in doubt.
Ordinary subjects and officials will not neglect their tasks.
The ten thousand things will each find their place.
Words that do not resemble these writings [that were created by heaven]
are patterns of confusion and falsehood and should not be made use of.
When we evaluate them
they are patterns that mislead men.
Should we dare use them
later generations would be without progeny.
This is so because
they would violate and hurt the people
through neglect for the divisions of heaven and earth.
Heaven and earth are in control of life.
When men oppose and confuse their Yin and Yang
heaven and earth will for this reason let men be without progeny.
In ancient times there were no texts.
So heaven forgave men.
After heaven’s manuscripts have come out
we have all come to know the intention of heaven’s teachings.
For this reason, once we offend it,
we are unlucky, suffering death in many forms and not living long.
This is for exactly this reason.
In what is bestowed there is older and younger brother,
who by category harmoniously respond to each other
[just as]the five march mounts respond to each other over a distance of ten thousand miles.
When you think intensely and in detail
to the good in one case another good responds,
just as what is mean responds to what is mean,
much is related to much, little to little, high to high and low to low,
without any exception.
We always examine things by taking up five times five, this is twenty-five qi
in their response to twenty-five families
or twenty-five grave mounds.
When what is written is in complete response
it is earth’s prognostic.
When it happens that its qi is supportive
it is soil that is related as are older and younger brother.
Its people have the same likes and dislikes.
Various animals and plants [are] also [related to] each other by category
once earth is of the same qi.
Thereby we can distinguish and elucidate
where earth proves to be in response and where it is not.
Since qi of water is [related as are] older and younger brother
its fish and turtle [are related to] each other by category.
When we thereby make a prediction
we analyse where something comes from.
All ten thousand things and all facts
can thus be understood.
What has the same figure
has the same physical entity.
What has a different figure
has a different physical entity.
”Is” and “is not” are exactly like this.
[Texts] must be in mutual response with spirits.
As false texts do not heal they mislead men
and cannot rescue from death.
Certain writings have been sent by demonic spirits
and have, we don´t know how, healing powers.
Due to personal fate and fortune a man may overcome what is false [in such writings]
while other men should not make use of them.
Based on the examination that is described above we collect all engraved writings.
False ones can be critiqued and sent altogether into a wilderness where there are no people.
These texts must be searched one by one.
It should not be done in one go.
This plant has vital essence and spirit
that can be put into service.
It is a plant with an official position.
When a cure happens in response in ten cases out of ten
it is the sovereign’s plant.
When there is response in nine cases out of ten
it is the high official’s plant.
When there is response in eight out of ten cases
it is the people’s plant.
When less than this
it should not be used,
being a plant that misleads men.
This is the art to rescue life from death
and must be investigated in detail.
When the recipe is appropriate and cures immediately
we make a report on this plant.
We speak of “recipe that cures immediately”.
When there is a cure in one day,
we speak of “recipe that cures in one day”.
When on application it cures in two days,
we speak of “two days’ recipe”.
When on application it cures in three days
we speak of “three days’ recipe”.
A recipe for an application that cures in one day
employs spirits of heaven to do the healing.
A recipe for an application that cures in two days
employs spirits of earth to do the healing.
A recipe for an application that cures in three days
employs demons of [deceased] men to do the healing.
What is not like this
is not a recipe of heaven’s spirits
but is a plant that provides medical treatment on its own.
Sometimes there is a cure and sometimes there is no cure.
We speak of “recipe for meeting with death”.
Be aware!
The art of rescuing life from death [that we mentioned above]
must not be altered.
The facts must be carefully investigated.
We call them “messengers that heals illness”,
just as a human being who has something to teach [ dao] is called messenger.
Being a spirit-like man and spirit-like teacher.
This means that heaven, earth, men, spirits of vital essence and demons have sent these recipes.
When [a recipe] is found and on application cures in ten out of ten and one hundred out of one hundred cases
it is the spirit recipe of the sovereign’s supreme majesty.
When it cures in nine out of ten cases
it is the spirit recipe of kings and feudal lords.
When in eight out of ten cases
it is the spirit recipe of a gentleman in the white robe of a high official who is of outstanding virtue and lives in retirement.
Each recipe has its effect.
When this is examined
there is not a single mistake.
These three are all spirit drugs that are circulated by heaven, earth and men to heal illness.
Heaven has everyone obtain fate from their ancestors.
which is tied to the art of what is as it is
that is so central one cannot get away from it.
An example for this are male and female phoenix and unicorn
who have virtue tied to their body.
[Another] example are bees and wasps
who have poison tied to their body.
This is what is meant.
We must thoroughly understand the perfect intention of heaven’s teachings.
and will then become able to elucidate the nature of heaven’s teachings,
be of benefit to the sovereign’s rein
and let men be free from doubt.
In case men do not know the essential texts
but say that all books in all under heaven
can be of use
[we say that] those with less than seven in ten successful cures are false
and not in response to the three auspicious omina.
They cause harm that is quite severe.
So healing an injury in one of ten cases
does not meet heaven’s intention.
When in two of ten cases
it does not meet earth’s intention.
When in three of ten cases
it does not meet men’s intention.
A cure in less than six or seven cases
brings healing into confusion.
Yin and Yang will for this reason be mischievous and oppositional
and spirits and other numinous beings will for this reason pick fights.
Therefore the sage kings and imperial rulers of old
although remaining in the dark chamber
pondered heaven’s intentions deeply.
This enabled them to stay intact
and on their own gain longevity and prolong life.
My writings and sayings are brought together with each other from beginning to end and arranged into a text.
Worthy and enlightened men read it for a supplement.
Thereby they rescue men from misconceptions and doubts
and let them prolong good luck and stay away from ill luck and harm.
Each man must from morning to night think about this text’s perfect intention
and will thereby keep himself intact.
In the past as well as today the hundred surnames have spread children’s songs.
When heaven is about to change
it brings it about that these songs have something to say.
When at times spirit books come forth
heaven transmits its sayings
to men of perfect virtue
in order to rescue the world from doom.
Now heaven teaches to hate killing and enjoy giving life.
All beings that wriggle have understanding
and must not lightly be killed or injured when used.
There is the chance that this afflicts an injury to preparing the recipe.
We must wait until an animal or insect is fully developed,
and when there is no alternative then make use of it.
Therefore the ten thousand things numerous as they are
have a fate that is linked to heaven,
and a root that lies in earth.
To handle them safely lies with men.
When a man understands heaven’s intention he lives long.
When he forgets it he perishes.
All beings take heaven and earth as their constant principle,
and man as their king.
That man acts as king and superior
must be thoroughly investigated.
Then the expert on the meaning of heaven’s patterns
moves in what he says upwards
and exhausts heaven’s teachings.
Or the specialist on earth’s structures
moves in what he says downwards
and completely explore earth’s way.
Or the specialist on external matters, moving sideways,
explores the four directions.
Others talk from the perspective of meditation
and reach what is deep inside.
or get to the bottom of things.
A specialist for all ten thousand things’ vital essence
reaches all the ten thousand things.
Some reach what is inside
while others reach what is outside.
Root and branches, trunk as well as blossoms and leaves all become manifest.
Everything is named according to category and figure.
The best meaning of all items that occur in the writings
as well as the patterns of heaven and earth and Yin and Yang
become manifest in outline.
From head to foot all is complete
and linked to each other upwards and downwards.
[A thing’s category is the way it is.]g
Through these procedures the [experts] jointly deliberate the meaning [of a character],
and put it individually into writing
the best of which are collected into one statement.
By these means a sage who wants to match the intention of heaven’s teachings
will by means of adjusting Yin and Yang
secure the king’s [rein],
bring peace to all under heaven
and make the whole crowd of spirits joyful and happy.
Therefore he must gather a number of worthy, renowned and experienced men and instruct them to create a constant law
that for ten thousand generations will see no alteration.
We ignore the intention of heaven’s teachings
because we see worth in the words of individuals.
Well familiar with one aspect ,
their insight is not complete.
They are not able to extend into all six directions
and completely penetrate the seven inner and outer places.
Since they are not yet able to fathom the vital essence of all ten thousand beings
each of them expresses a different opinion.
This makes heaven’s writings err from the original text and
is exactly where confusion, misconceptions and doubt
arise from.
If we want to straighten things out:
Each has its own root.
Could this be fully explored,
Yin and Yang would no longer be changeable
and all would be just as it is [fixed in heaven’s writings].
If not,
what we call “lonely saying” and “isolated words”
do not match what the scripture intends.
To follow the words of an individual
is what we call a partial way of speaking.
It is the nature of heaven and earth
that with the exception of the sage no one can on his own speak comprehensively about heaven’s intention.
Therefore, should someone talk,
he would on the inside not be able to reach heaven’s heart
and on the outside not be able to explain heaven’s patterns and elucidate earth’ structures.
If predicting a turn-out he would not get it right.
Spirits and other numinous beings would not serve him.
Having erred from the straight path
he would fall into doubt and confusion.
Therefore from day to day being more trivial and superficial
he does not grasp the [things’] common trunk and best meaning. .
The mistake lies here:
he makes the stem let go off its root.
He makes heaven’s teachings lose straightness.
When Yin and Yang inside a man become isolated he falls ill.
Mischieveous, confusing and harmful qi arise in large number.
The sovereign suffers bitterly in his heart,
but is unable to put a stop to this.
The qi that are linked to unusual events come one after the other and
and the people don’t live long.
They greatly complain about it.
Worthy and illustrious men jointly ignore the heart of heaven
and also make sages vanish into the far distance.
What follows is that they are not able to comprehend the structural divisions [of heaven’s teachings].
This is what we call to confuse teachings.
This is so because
in scriptures, teachings, and all writings and reports
what comes first and what follows are wrongly put together,
when we talk about heaven and earth.
At the beginning of all undertakings
is the basic intention of spirits and other numinous beings.
So once we understand their basic intention
spirits and other numinous beings are no longer aggressive and angry and do not put men to harm.
Then evil qi is locked up,
and groups of bandits and outlaws are dissolved.
Once bandits and outlaws cease to exist
Yi and Di barbarians return to allegiance, and
wind and rain come in time.
This provides clear evidence of heaven’s joy and happiness.
Because heaven is happy it loves its children.
Therefore the sovereign prolongs his life.
Because affluence extends to his people.
it has an impact on the six domestic animals and the wild birds and beasts
and extends deep into plants.
Because harmonious qi is seen everywhere.
false and evil qi vanish and perish.
and then regular qi become more brilliant.
This is the method of Yin and Yang and of what is as it is.
This is the same as being active during the day
is followed at night by going into hiding.
or a small man’s giving up
being followed by a gentleman taking over.
Think carefully about these words.
They increase life
because they distinguish and elucidate Yin and Yang and give joy to spirits.
Should you think that my writings go wrong
approach this by testing results.
If you want to know whether there is profit or loss in my writings
make a test by writing out one character and
put it up in front.
Let all worthies sitting in a circle talk about it.
They will not agree when it comes to identifying the meaning
and each will differ in his analysis.
Should we be satisfied with knowing what one of them says
this would mean that no clarity has been achieved.
[Then] how could we give structure to Yin and Yang
and let the king roam about and be merry, free from business?
Therefore, because those who stick to the root are few
and those who talk are many
there is nothing that is not fully explored.
That those who stick to the root are many and those who talk are few
will let teachings become daily more trivial and shallow.
Should they become shallow without end
confusion would be the outcome.
Should there be confusion without end,
Yin and Yang would be unhappy
and false qi would immediately be on the rise.
Therefore, a sage king must give weight to the root.
Because the gentleman gives straightness to the beginnings,
nothing is without structure.
Because we don’t give weight and honour to the root of an action
and don’t give straightness to its beginning
actions in general lose orientation,
and the ten thousand things are confused like clouds
and cannot again be structured.
Let us refine and elucidate things and
doubtful teachings and false writings will vanish.
In one hundred thousand cases out of one hundred thousand, ten thousand out of ten thousand, one thousand out of one thousand, one hundred out of one hundred and ten out of ten
if it is a cycle of twelve days it is so,
or [if] a cycle of twelve years it is so,
or [if] a cycle of sixty years it is so,
or [if] a cycle of one hundred and twenty years it is so.
Whether there are one hundred thousand cases of sameness,
ten thousand cases,
a thousand cases,
a hundred cases,
or ten cases of sameness,
all is like the sequence of heaven’s stems and earth’s branches.
Careful examination can bring these things together.
We elucidate the past
because we also understand the present.
We understand the present
because in turn we elucidate the past.
This is how we understand the ways of heaven’s constancy
and fully distinguish and elucidate the structures of Yin and Yang.
Writings and sayings can be misleading or not. [The point is that]
what comes before and what follows must supplement each other.
Sameness in the music of songs, piece by piece
is said to be the model for the big, medium and small cycle.
We match its intention,
and structure its action
in order to adjust and harmonise Yin and Yang
and secure the king’s [rein].
This can help to examine the constant model [that figures] in heaven’swritings .
Just like spring and autumn and winter and summer
it would not mislead.
Nowadays, the life latter born men have at their disposal is short.
How can someone who has not yet seen one cycle to the end,
understand that there are three, this is one big, one small and one medium cycle?
And that of old there have always been spirit teachings?
Therefore men err from the straight path.
They look at what extends just for a moment
and not yet having perused the spirit texts of antiquity and of today
follow partial sayings
while proposing that they themselves are right.
This is just like a cicada that is born and dies in spring
and does not see what happens in autumn,
or is born and ends in summer
and does not see what happens in winter.
What a man talks about he he must have immediately in front of his eyes.
What can be seen can be talked about.
Therefore, even if we were to discuss something in full
it would be as if we had no understanding
if inside us there were nothing like it.
What leaves texts of heaven without verification
is exactly this.
So things do not appear in vain,
[but] at times there are patterns that lend structure to what is confused.
Teachings do not appear in vain,
[but]when times are ripe.
So the creations of the poets of old
are qi flowing from heaven,
which makes their words be not in vain.
Therefore the wise, the worthy and the sovereigns of old,
from seeing what was subtle understood what the outcome would be.
Since when taking a certain action
they adhered to its qi
they matched heaven’s intention.
Therefore they enjoyed longlasting good luck.
When we oppose [heaven’s intention] qi of floods and droughts become mischieveous and perverse.
Ongoing disasters are piled up.
Unusual events and strange occurences cannot be brought to a halt.
